About

Hey there! I’m Prabhjot Singh, a passionate learner with a strong curiosity for building and improving things. I enjoy creating projects and learning valuable insights from each one. I’ve successfully completed the #100DaysOfCode challenge on X, which helped me build discipline and consistency.

I’m enthusiastic about web development and constantly working on sharpening my skills. I believe in consistent effort over quick completion, because the journey is more important than the destination.

After all — "Life mein, filmon ki tarah, ant main sab theek ho jata hai. Aur agar theek na ho, toh woh ant nahin hai. Picture abhi baaki hai mere dost."
